title: Exploring beetroot (Beta vulgaris L.) for diabetes mellitus and Alzheimer's disease dual therapy: in vitro and computational studies
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19362-19380
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03638G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Oluwafemi Adeleke Ojo, Gideon Ampoma Gyebi, Emmanuel Henry Ezenabor, Matthew Iyobhebhe, Damilola Abigael Emmanuel, Oluwatumininu Adetoro Adelowo, Faith Eniola Olujinmi, Temitope Emmanuel Ogunwale, Dare Ezekiel Babatunde, Akingbolabo Daniel Ogunlakin, Adebola Busola Ojo, Oluyomi Stephen Adeyemi
This study explored the flavonoid-rich extract of beetroot (Beta vulgaris L.) for type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2D) and Alzheimer's disease (AD) dual therapy by using in vitro and molecular simulation studies.
